page.title: 16The Airedale Gala
page.content: One of the customs of Airedale is that it holds a festival{Gala}each year.We interviewed Mrs.A.Beedle at the Airedale Family centre.She told us that the first{Gala}was held in 1979.Welfare worker Mrs M.Lowe wanted to commemorate the International Year of the Child.There have been five more {Galas}since then.On{Gala}day decorated lorries drive round the street.In 1979 & 1980 our school decorated a lorry. This is called a float.Our first float looked like a castle and we dressed up in long dresses.The boys wore doublet and hose.We were black and white minstrels on the second one.The children have games,sports and rides.Money made on past{Gala}days has gone to childrens charities,Cancer Relief,Gingerbread,Muscular Sclerosis.
